Hexxagon.View

Class InfoBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.mvc.TView
      • Hexxagon.View.InfoBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInfoBoard, IView

    public final class InfoBoard
extends TView
implements IInfoBoard
    Instance of this class realises an info panel of game as a JavaFX specific graphical node.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey
